00008 import javax.swing.*;
00009 import java.io.*;
00010 import javax.swing.text.*;
00011 
00016 public class TabbedDocument {
00017

00019     public TabbedDocument(File file, TabbedEditor tabbedEditor, int TabIndex) {
00020 
00021         fileLocal = file;
00022         setTabIndex(TabIndex);
00023         tabbedEditorLocal = tabbedEditor;
00024         
00025         setTabTitle(file);
00026         
00027         textPaneLocal = new javax.swing.JTextPane();
00028         caretListenerLocal = 
00029                 new CaretListenerLabel(tabbedEditor.caretPositionLabelLocal, 
00030                 textPaneLocal);       
00031         
00032         StyledDocument styledDocTemp = textPaneLocal.getStyledDocument();
00033         if (styledDocTemp instanceof AbstractDocument) {
00034             abstractDocumentLocal = (AbstractDocument)styledDocTemp;
00035             abstractDocumentLocal.addDocumentListener(
00036                     new tabDocumentListener(tabbedEditorLocal, this));
00037         } else {
00038             System.err.println("Text pane's document isn't an AbstractDocument!");
00039             System.exit(-1);
00040         } 
00041 
00042     
00043     }
00044 
00045     public javax.swing.JScrollPane generateTab() {
00046 
00047         scrollPaneLocal = new javax.swing.JScrollPane();
00048         scrollPaneLocal.setViewportView(textPaneLocal);
00049         textPaneLocal.addCaretListener(caretListenerLocal);    
00050         return scrollPaneLocal;
00051     }
00052     public void setFile(File file) {
00053         fileLocal = file;
00054     }
00055     public File getFile() {
00056         return fileLocal;
00057     }
00058     public void setTabTitle(File file) {
00059 
00060         if (fileLocal == null) {
00061             tabFileName = "Untitled"
00062                     + Integer.toString(tabbedEditorLocal.getUntitledDocCount());
00063         } else {
00064             if (file.canWrite() == false) {
00065                 // Place <> around tab name to distiguish read only
00066                 tabFileName = "<" + file.getName() + ">";
00067             } else {
00068                 tabFileName = file.getName();
00069             }
00070             
00071         }
00072     }
00073     public String getTabTitle() {
00074         return tabFileName;
00075     }
00076     public int getTabIndex() {
00077         return tabIndex;
00078     }
00079     public void setTabIndex(int index) {
00080         tabIndex = index;
00081     }
00082     public javax.swing.JTextPane getTextPane() {
00083         return textPaneLocal;
00084     }
00085     
00090     public javax.swing.JScrollPane getScrollPane() {
00091         return scrollPaneLocal;
00092     }
00093     
00094     public void setModifed(boolean Modified) {
00095         modified = Modified;
00096     }
00097     
00098     public boolean isModifed() {
00099         return modified;
00100     }
00101     
00102     public String getCaretLabelText() {
00103         return caretListenerLocal.getText();
00104     }
